mapper.select: SELECT MEM_ID, MEM_PASS, MEM_NAME, MEM_HP, MEM_MAIL, MEM_BIR FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = #{memId} AND MEM_PASS = #{memPass}
SELECT MEM_ID, MEM_NAME, MEM_HP , MEM_MAIL, MEM_ADD1, MEM_MILEAGE , MEM_BIR , ( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT CART_PROD) FROM CART WHERE CART_MEMBER = MEM_ID ) PROD_COUNT FROM MEMBER

SELECT MEM_ID, MEM_PASS, MEM_NAME, MEM_REGNO1, MEM_REGNO2, MEM_BIR, MEM_ZIP, MEM_ADD1, MEM_ADD2, MEM_HOMETEL, MEM_COMTEL, MEM_HP, MEM_MAIL, MEM_JOB, MEM_LIKE, MEM_MEMORIAL, MEM_MEMORIALDAY, MEM_MILEAGE, MEM_DELETE FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = #{memId}
